abstract.p: Using the theory of Belyĭ maps, we calculate the algebraic curves associated to the Fuchsian groups of signature (1;e) that are commensurable with a triangle group, along with the Picard-Fuchs differential equations on these curves, which are related to pullbacks of hypergeometric differential equations. We focus particularly on the (1;e)-groups that are arithmetic.
